summary: Thirteen years after the end of the Vietnam War, a family who was tragically affected by the war are forced to emigrate to America.
cast: Kieu Chinh|Long Nguyen|Diem Lien|Jayvee Mai The Hiep|Khanh Doan|Cat Ly|Nguyen Thai Nguyen|Raul Alba|Robert Beckman|George Bui|Alex Dorman|Alan Vo Ford|Jose Gutierrez|Jiruyut Khieosawat|Tere Morris|Net Ngo|Hieu Nguyen|Jacquie Nguyen|Kim Chi Tran Nguyen|Lam Nguyen|Preston Tri Nguyen|Thomas Thong Nguyen|Javier Ortiz|Thuan Phan|Tam Thanh|Tanya Wong
title: Viaje desde el abismo
